Following the recent riots, its time that criminals actually pay for the crimes rather than living a life of contiunal comfortabilty in and out of prision and on the welfare states behalf.

I table that convicted criminals are tagged and forced to perform national service as a vaild meathod of repayment for there crimes..

If this falls fowl of a European Law then, we as the UK have the right to veto such laws.
